content.rendered:
Send Love & Hugs with our delightful seasonal bouquet of fresh flowers and decadent Loco Love chocolates. Whether it’s a birthday, anniversary, or just to show you care, this floral bouquet is the perfect way to express your affection and bring smiles to those you cherish.

Each bouquet is carefully curated to highlight the finest seasonal flowers available in our studio on the day.

Finished with our signature wrap and trailing ribbon.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this, with no two flowers the same! Images are provided for illustrative purposes only. Flower dimensions and colour vary depending on seasons and availability. Please place your trust in us, to choose the finest flowers and chocolates to convey your sentiments.

Size guide ~ Plinth diameter 32cm
Standard option pictured

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
